name: One 4 All
description:
Play as a musketeer with your friends in a local co-op action game, fight your way with style, tactics and by solving puzzles through a world full of dangers. And more importantly, try not to hit your allies!

Features:

  • 4 players co-op
  • Procedural objectives and enemies arrangements for more replayability
  • Various versus modes: duel, conquest and "mousquet ball"
  • Interact with the environment, and manipulate deadly weapons like canons and catapults

Note:

Best played with gamepads, and other players need to press "Start" to join the game.
